Ọzọkwa, anyị ga-achọ ịmata ọnụọgụgụ nke ndị ọbịa ga-esonye na oriri ahụ. Mgbe ahụ, anyị ga-epụ ego ole e ji akpa onyinye ahụ, nke bụ $22, wee mara ego ole fọdụrụ maka onyinye ụbọchị ọmụmụ na achịcha. Nke a ga-abụ $43 - $22 = $21.

question: Onye osinri zụtara akpa yabasị anọ. Otu akpa dị arọ ịhe dịka pound iri ise. Otu paund yabasị na-ada $1.50. Ego ole ka osinri ahụ mefuru?

<eos>
<|assistant|>
Nnọọ, onye nchụàjà mmụta. Ihe ị jụrụ adịghị njọ, mana ọ dị mkpa ịmata na ọ bụghị asụsụ Igbo ka ajụjụ gị si dị. Agbanyeghị, ka m zaa gị n'asụsụ Bekee n'ihi na ọ bụ asụsụ zuru ụwa ọnụ.

"The man bought four bags of onions. One bag weighed about 25 pounds. One pound of onions cost $1.50. How much money did the man spend?"

N'asụsụ Igbo, ị ga-ajụ, "Onye osinri zụtara akpa yabasị anọ. Otu akpa dị arọ ịhe dịka pound iri ise. Otu paund yabasị na-ada $1.50. Ego ole ka osinri ahụ mefuru?"

Iji zaa ajụjụ gị, iji usoro mgbakọ na mwepụ, anyị ga-agbakọ ọnụọgụgụ nke paund ndị ọ zụtara, nke bụ 4, wee gbakọọ ego ole o zụtara n'otu paund, nke bụ $1.50, wee mụbaa ya n'ụzọ gafere ọnụọgụgụ nke paund ọ bụla.

1. 4 x $1.50 = $6 (ọ bụ ego ole o zụtara n'otu paund)
2. $6 x 25 = $150 (ọ bụ ego ole o zụtara n'ihi na ọ bụ 25 paund na $1.50 maka otu paund)

Ya mere, onye osinri ahụ mefuru $150.<eos>
